                          { assortmentId?: string },
                          AssortmentMediaType[],
                          { assortmentId?: string },
                      >;
                      assortmentMediaTextLoader: DataLoader<
                          { assortmentMediaId: string; locale: Locale },
                          AssortmentMediaText,
                          { assortmentMediaId: string; locale: Locale },
                      >;

                          { assortmentId: string; productId: string },
                          AssortmentProduct,
                          { assortmentId: string; productId: string },
                      >;

                          AssortmentProduct[],
                          { productId: string },
                      >;

                      >;

                          { isoCode: string },
                          Country,
                          { isoCode: string },
                      >;

                          { isoCode: string },
                          Currency,
                          { isoCode: string },
                      >;

                          { deliveryProviderId: string },
                          DeliveryProvider,
                          { deliveryProviderId: string },
                      >;
                      fileLoader: DataLoader<{ fileId: string }, File, { fileId: string }>;
                      filterLoader: DataLoader<
                          { filterId: string },
                          Filter,
                          { filterId: string },
                      >;

                          { filterId: string; filterOptionValue?: string; locale: Locale },
                          FilterText,
                          { filterId: string; filterOptionValue?: string; locale: Locale },
                      >;

                          { isoCode: string },
                          Language,
                          { isoCode: string },
                      >;

                          { paymentProviderId: string },

                          { sku: string },
                      >;

                          { productId?: string },

                          { locale: Locale; productMediaId: string },

                          { locale: Locale; productId: string },
                      >;

                  version?: string;

                  modules: GridFSFileUploadsModule;
              };

          res: Response,
      ): Promise<void>
